properties.areaDesc: Allen, LA; Jefferson Davis, LA; Cameron, LA; Beauregard, LA; Calcasieu, LA; Rapides, LA; Vernon, LA
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 3:14AM CST until January 11 at 4:15AM CST by NWS Lake Charles LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northwestern Cameron Parish in southwestern Louisiana...
Western Rapides Parish in central Louisiana...
Western Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana...
Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana...
Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana...
Vernon Parish in west central Louisiana...
Allen Parish in southwestern Louisiana...

* Until 415 AM CST.

* At 313 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Kurthwood to near Johnsons Bayou, moving east
at 30 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Lake Charles, Sulphur, Cameron, Leesville, Westlake, Vinton, Iowa,
Kinder, Oberlin, Rosepine, Boyce, Elizabeth, Fenton, Reeves,
Singer, Hayes, Moss Bluff, Johnsons Bayou, Sugartown and Lacassine
National Wildlife Refuge.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 7 and 52.
Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12.
Interstate 49 between mile markers 93 and 109.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM CST for central,
southwestern and west central Louisiana.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
